ShortDescription: ATS Group Company JOBS FOUNTAIN (JF) which has been into the foray of local recruitments for over a decade and has a very strong presence pan India. Arafa Travel Service uses the services of JF for sourcing the candidates from India for its overseas recruitments as JF has the advantage of a wider reach across India for sourcing candidates due to its strong local presence and network.
enhanced_description: ARAFA TRAVEL SERVICES (ATS), established in 1984 and based in Mumbai, India, is a recruitment organization with over three decades of experience. It is officially registered with the 'Ministry of Indian Overseas Affairs & Ministry of External Affairs' Government of India. ATS specializes in promoting quality workforce, particularly for overseas recruitments. The company emphasizes sincerity, dedication, and building long-term relationships with both employers and candidates. They leverage their group company, JOBS FOUNTAIN (JF), which has a strong pan-India presence and network, for efficient local sourcing of candidates from India for overseas placements. ATS is recognized for its high standards of professionalism and accountability, earning appreciation from employers globally. They are committed to a noble cause, striving to provide opportunities to deserving, qualified, and skilled candidates, especially from unexplored regions, through tireless efforts.
